verify_failure:
User verified failure!
You can sign in to resend a new verify code again.
forgot_info: Please input your email to reset your password.
name_pattern_err: Login may only contain alphanumeric characters or single hyphens, and cannot begin or end with a hyphen
pass_pattern_err: Password needs 7 characters and at least one number
changemail_info: Hi, please input your new email address, then we will send a email for you to verify.
changemail_success: A verify email has be sent to your new email inbox, please check it out.
changpass_info: Hi, please input your old and new password.Clicking the checkbox can display your new password.
changpass_success: Your new password is effect, please keep in mind.
email_verify_info: Send a verify link to your email inbox.
send_verify_success: A verify link has sent to your email inbox!Please check it out.
